sen.j: 尾上 左近（おのえ さこん）は、歌舞伎役者。
sen.e: Sakon ONOE is the name of a Kabuki actor lineage.
Sakon ONOE is the name of a Kabuki actor lineage.
Sakon ONOE is the name of a Kabuki actor lineage.
The family's stage name was Otowaya.

- He was the eldest son of Shoroku ONOE II.

sen.j: のちの尾上辰之助 (初代)。
sen.e: He later took the name Tatsunosuke ONOE I.
He later took the name Tatsunosuke ONOE I.
He later took the name Tatsunosuke ONOE I.

sen.j: 没後、3代目尾上松緑を追贈。
sen.e: After he died, the name of Shoroku ONOE III was bestowed on him posthumously.

tit.cmt: 「二代目尾上左近」とウェブで確認し、原文訳文ともに訂正しました。

sen.e: - He was the eldest son of the founder of the lineage.
